column4: has anyone tried running a power supply (200w) without a fan? i want this darn thing to be as quiet as possible and ripped the fan out, wonder if it will hold :)
wll its been running for 24hours without a fan on either cpu or ps
.. I imagine that varies from model to model.  I've done the same to a video card and survived however.  my best advice is to keep a close eye on it for a good while
turn it off when it smells funny :)
